Supplementary Table 3. Sensitivity Analy: Comparison of original mGPS weighting (0/1/2 points) versus binary classification.
Original weighting retained in final model for superior discrimination.
Abbreviations: mGPS = modified Glasgow Prognostic Score.
mGPS scoring: 0 = CRP ≤10 mg/L and albumin ≥35 g/L; 1 = CRP >10 mg/L or albumin <35 g/L; 2 = CRP >10 mg/L and albumin <35 g/L.
